plant.question: I am green and grow from the ground. Animals love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sun to grow!
🐰 Bunnies like to munch on me.
🐄 Cows eat me in the field.

plant.question: I have a trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in gardens.
🐝 I help bees make honey.
🌹 I can be red, yellow, or pink.

plant.question: I grow underground, and I am orange. Rabbits like to eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 You can eat me raw or cooked!
🚜 Farmers grow me in their gardens.
👁️ I'm good for your eyes!

plant.question: I am a long green vegetable that grows on a vine. People make pickles out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I have bumps on my skin.
🥪 I taste good in a sandwich!
🌱 I start as a small seed.

plant.question: I am round and red. I grow on a vine. People and monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am juicy and sweet.
🍝 You can make sauce from me.
☀️ I need lots of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow seeds. You can pop me into a yummy snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in a field.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies!
🐔 Chickens like to eat me too!

plant.question: I am a big, round, green fruit with red insides and black seeds. I am very refreshing in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am mostly water.
🏖️ I am a great snack at the beach.
🚜 Farmers need lots of space to grow me.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant that can live for many years. I have rings inside my trunk that tell you how old I am. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 People use me to build houses and furniture.
🦉 Owls sometimes live in holes in my trunk.
✂️ You have to cut me to see the rings inside.

plant.question: I am a green, leafy herb that smells and tastes like pizza. People like to sprinkle me on pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often used in Italian cooking.
🪴 You can grow me in a pot on your windowsill.
🍕 I make pizza taste even better!

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People sit inside me to go places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I am something you might see in a parking lot.
👪 Families often use me for trips.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and can carry many people.
⚓️ I often visit ports.
🛳️ I might take you on a cruise!

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals. You use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👦👧 Kids and adults can ride me.
🚳 You can ride me in a park.
⚙️ I have a chain.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing red lights.
🎒 I have many seats for children.
📄 I follow a set route.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to faraway places very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings.
🌥️ You can see me above the clouds.
🚦 I need a runway to take off and land.

transport.question: I run on tracks and take many people to different cities and towns. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.
🛤️ I follow a special road.

transport.question: I am a car that you can wave down. I take you where you want to go for money. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I am often yellow or black.
🚖 I have a meter to count the cost.
🚦 You can find me near bus and train stations.

transport.question: I help firefighters get to the fire quickly with a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am painted red and white.
🚨 I have a ladder on top.
💧 I spray water to put out fires.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that carries people up and down a mountain on a cable. What am I?

hints.text: 🏔️ You use me when skiing.
🚠 I offer great views from above.
🔌 I need electricity to move.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that travels into space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I can reach the moon.
🧑‍🚀 Astronauts fly me.
🪐 I travel beyond Earth's atmosphere.
